Gov. Kemp COVID-19 Updates - For questions and clarification, please call the Governor's Office at 404-656-1776.

After May 1st, leaves can be placed in recyclable paper bags and placed along with yard waste. Please see the attached for additional updates:

div.h4:
Governor Kemp's Executive Order 4/2/2020 - Shelter in Place now extended through April 3oth.
Gov. Kemp COVID-19 Updates - For questions and clarification, please call the Governor's Office at 404-656-1776.

div.h4: The City has made some cancellations/changes due to the Coronavirus. Yard waste pick-up will resume on Monday, April 20th. Bulk leaf pick-up will run for two weeks from April 20th to May 1st. After May 1st, leaves can be placed in recyclable paper bags and placed along with yard waste. Please see the attached for additional updates:
